Package com.aep.dao

Interface CourseDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
CourseDAOImpl
public interface CourseDAO
CourseDAO interface defines methods for interacting with the Course table in the database.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    createCourse(CourseDTO course)
    Creates a new course in the database.
    void
    deleteCourse(int courseId)
    Deletes a course from the database by its ID.

    getAllInstitutions()
    Fetches the names of all institutions offering courses.

    Fetches a course by its ID.

  • Method Details

    • createCourse

      void createCourse(CourseDTO course)
      Creates a new course in the database.
      Parameters:
      course - the Course object to be added

    • getCourseById

      CourseDTO getCourseById(int courseId)
      Fetches a course by its ID.
      Parameters:
      courseId - the ID of the course to fetch
      Returns:
      the Course object, or null if not found

    • getCoursesByInstitution

      List<CourseDTO> getCoursesByInstitution(int institutionId)
      Fetches all courses offered by a specific institution.
      Parameters:
      institutionId - the ID of the institution
      Returns:
      a list of courses offered by the institution

    • searchCoursesByCriteria

      List<CourseDTO> searchCoursesByCriteria(String courseCode, String courseTitle, String institutionName, String term, String schedule, String deliveryMethod)
      Searches courses by multiple criteria.
      Parameters:
      courseCode - the course code
      courseTitle - the course title
      institutionName - the institution name
      term - the term
      schedule - the schedule
      deliveryMethod - the delivery method
      Returns:
      a list of courses matching the criteria

    • updateCourse

      void updateCourse(CourseDTO course)
      Updates an existing course in the database.
      Parameters:
      course - the Course object with updated details

    • deleteCourse

      void deleteCourse(int courseId)
      Deletes a course from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      courseId - the ID of the course to delete

    • getAllInstitutions

      List<String> getAllInstitutions()
      Fetches the names of all institutions offering courses.
      Returns:
      a list of institution names

    • getCourseCodesByInstitution

      List<String> getCourseCodesByInstitution(String institutionName)
      Fetches course codes offered by a specific institution.
      Parameters:
      institutionName - the name of the institution
      Returns:
      a list of course codes offered by the institution

    • getCourseTitlesByCourseCode

      List<String> getCourseTitlesByCourseCode(String courseCode)
      Fetches course titles associated with a specific course code.
      Parameters:
      courseCode - the course code
      Returns:
      a list of course titles associated with the course code
